name: 洪媽益
objective:
本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics: phonetics & phonology, syntax, semantics, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on language learning (native or foreign), teaching or other language-related study.
